languages.text: "Пожалуй, такой вердикт повергнет в ужас Его Преосвященство, но его почитатели смогут слушать записи проповедей кардинала Анвиласа еще не один век и поклоняться его останкам — с тем же фанатичным рвением, что и при жизни гипотетического святого. Ожидайте щедрых пожертвований на постройку автоматической часовни, ведь многие пожелают приложить руку к такому историческому событию".

"I imagine the verdict will horrify the cardinal, but on the other hand, centuries from now, his followers will still be able to listen to his recorded sermons and worship his remains with the same fanatical zeal as in the notional saint's lifetime. Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй, такой вердикт повергнет в ужас Его Преосвященство, но его почитатели смогут слушать записи проповедей кардинала Анвиласа еще не один век и поклоняться его останкам — с тем же фанатичным рвением, что и при жизни гипотетического святого. Ожидайте щедрых пожертвований на постройку автоматической часовни, ведь многие пожелают приложить руку к такому историческому событию".

traits.locale_text: "I imagine the verdict will horrify His Holiness, but on the other hand, centuries from now, his followers will still be able to listen to Cardinal Anvylas's recorded sermons and worship his remains — with the same fanatical zeal as in the notional saint's lifetime. Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, das Urteil wird den Kardinal erschrecken, aber andererseits können seine Gefolgsleute sich in ein paar Jahrhunderten immer noch seine aufgezeichneten Predigten anhören und seine Überreste mit demselben fanatischen Eifer anbeten wie zu Lebzeiten des theoretischen Heiligen. Rechnet mit großzügigen Spenden für den Bau der automatisierten Kapelle, da gewiss viele Leute an einem derart monumentalen Ereignis beteiligt sein wollen."
languages.original_text: "I imagine the verdict will horrify the cardinal, but on the other hand, centuries from now, his followers will still be able to listen to his recorded sermons and worship his remains with the same fanatical zeal as in the notional saint's lifetime. Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, das Urteil wird den Kardinal erschrecken, aber andererseits können seine Gefolgsleute sich in ein paar Jahrhunderten immer noch seine aufgezeichneten Predigten anhören und seine Überreste mit demselben fanatischen Eifer anbeten wie zu Lebzeiten des theoretischen Heiligen. Rechnet mit großzügigen Spenden für den Bau der automatisierten Kapelle, da gewiss viele Leute an einem derart monumentalen Ereignis beteiligt sein wollen."

"Ich nehme an, das Urteil wird Seine Eminenz erschrecken, aber andererseits können seine Gefolgsleute sich in ein paar Jahrhunderten immer noch die aufgezeichneten Predigten von Kardinal Anvylas anhören und seine Überreste mit demselben fanatischen Eifer anbeten wie zu Lebzeiten des theoretischen Heiligen. Rechnet mit großzügigen Spenden für den Bau der automatisierten Kapelle, da gewiss viele Leute an einem derart monumentalen Ereignis beteiligt sein wollen."

languages.text: « J'ai bien peur que le cardinal soit horrifié par ce verdict, mais d'un autre côté, des siècles durant, ses disciples pourront encore écouter ses sermons préalablement enregistrés et vénérer sa dépouille avec autant de zèle que du vivant de leur précieux saint. Attendez-vous à de généreuses donations en faveur de la construction de la chapelle automatisée, nombreux seront ceux à vouloir participer à cet événement historique. »
languages.original_text: "I imagine the verdict will horrify the cardinal, but on the other hand, centuries from now, his followers will still be able to listen to his recorded sermons and worship his remains with the same fanatical zeal as in the notional saint's lifetime. Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien peur que le cardinal soit horrifié par ce verdict, mais d'un autre côté, des siècles durant, ses disciples pourront encore écouter ses sermons préalablement enregistrés et vénérer sa dépouille avec autant de zèle que du vivant de leur précieux saint. Attendez-vous à de généreuses donations en faveur de la construction de la chapelle automatisée, nombreux seront ceux à vouloir participer à cet événement historique. »

« J'ai bien peur que Son Éminence soit horrifiée par ce verdict, mais d'un autre côté, des siècles durant, ses disciples pourront encore écouter ses sermons préalablement enregistrés et vénérer sa dépouille avec autant de zèle que du vivant de leur précieux saint. Attendez-vous à de généreuses donations en faveur de la construction de la chapelle automatisée, nombreux seront ceux à vouloir participer à cet événement historique. »

languages.text: “这个判决可能会让红衣主教震惊不已，但从另一方面来看，接下来的几百年里，他的追随者依然可以聆听他的布道录音，以同样狂热的激情崇拜他的圣体，正如这位名义上的圣人在世时那样。相信许多人都希望能亲自参与这场重大事件，预计届时会有大笔捐款涌入，用来修建自动化教堂。”
languages.original_text: "I imagine the verdict will horrify the cardinal, but on the other hand, centuries from now, his followers will still be able to listen to his recorded sermons and worship his remains with the same fanatical zeal as in the notional saint's lifetime. Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

traits.locale_text: “这个判决可能会让红衣主教震惊不已，但从另一方面来看，接下来的几百年里，他的追随者依然可以聆听他的布道录音，以同样狂热的激情崇拜他的圣体，正如这位名义上的圣人在世时那样。相信许多人都希望能亲自参与这场重大事件，预计届时会有大笔捐款涌入，用来修建自动化教堂。”
“这个判决可能会让主教大人震惊不已，但从另一方面来看，接下来的几百年里，主教大人的追随者依然可以聆听他的布道录音，以同样狂热的激情崇拜他的圣体，正如这位名义上的圣人在世时那样。相信许多人都希望能亲自参与这场重大事件，预计届时会有大笔捐款涌入，用来修建自动化教堂。”

languages.text: «Imagino que el veredicto horrorizará al cardenal, pero, por otro lado, con el paso de los siglos, sus seguidores seguirán pudiendo escuchar sus sermones grabados y adorar sus restos con el mismo fervor fanático que el santo en potencia inspiró durante su vida. Espere donaciones generosas para la construcción de la capilla automatizada, ya que muchos querrán formar parte de un evento de tal magnitud».
languages.original_text: "I imagine the verdict will horrify the cardinal, but on the other hand, centuries from now, his followers will still be able to listen to his recorded sermons and worship his remains with the same fanatical zeal as in the notional saint's lifetime. Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

traits.locale_text: «Imagino que el veredicto horrorizará al cardenal, pero, por otro lado, con el paso de los siglos, sus seguidores seguirán pudiendo escuchar sus sermones grabados y adorar sus restos con el mismo fervor fanático que el santo en potencia inspiró durante su vida. Espere donaciones generosas para la construcción de la capilla automatizada, ya que muchos querrán formar parte de un evento de tal magnitud».

«Imagino que el veredicto horrorizará a Su Eminencia, pero, por otro lado, con el paso de los siglos, sus seguidores seguirán pudiendo escuchar los sermones grabados del cardenal Anvylas y adorar sus restos con el mismo fervor fanático que el santo en potencia inspiró durante su vida. Espere donaciones generosas para la construcción de la capilla automatizada, ya que muchos querrán formar parte de un evento de tal magnitud».

languages.text: 「その判決は猊下を恐怖させるだろうと想像します。ですが一方で、この先何世紀も、彼の信奉者たちはアンビラス枢機卿の録音された説教を聞き、名目上の聖人の生前の頃と同じ狂信的な熱意で彼の遺骸を崇拝し続けることでしょう。多くの人がこの重大な出来事に関わりたいと願うため、自動礼拝堂の建設に向けた寛大な寄付が期待されます」
languages.original_text: "I imagine the verdict will horrify His Eminence, but on the other hand, centuries from now, his followers will still be able to listen to Cardinal Anvylas's recorded sermons and worship his remains with the same fanatical zeal as in the notional saint's lifetime. Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

traits.locale_text: 「その判決は猊下を恐怖させるだろうと想像します。ですが一方で、この先何世紀も、彼の信奉者たちはアンビラス枢機卿の録音された説教を聞き、名目上の聖人の生前の頃と同じ狂信的な熱意で彼の遺骸を崇拝し続けることでしょう。多くの人がこの重大な出来事に関わりたいと願うため、自動礼拝堂の建設に向けた寛大な寄付が期待されます」

languages.text: "Bu hüküm, kardinali korkutacaktır elbet... Fakat şunu da düşünmek gerek: Bundan yüzyıllar sonra bile müritleri, onun kaydedilmiş vaazını dinleyebilecek. Sözüm ona azizlerinin sağlığındaki fanatik tutumlarını, onun kalıntılarına karşı sergilemeye devam edebilecek. Hem otomatik şapelin inşası için yüklü bağışlar da gelir. Pek çok kimsenin bu görkemli hadisenin bir parçası olmak isteyeceğini sanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I imagine the verdict will horrify the cardinal, but on the other hand, centuries from now, his followers will still be able to listen to his recorded sermons and worship his remains with the same fanatical zeal as in the notional saint's lifetime. Expect generous donations toward the construction of the automated chapel, since many will want to have a part in such a momentous event."

traits.locale_text: "Bu hüküm, kardinali korkutacaktır elbet... Fakat şunu da düşünmek gerek: Bundan yüzyıllar sonra bile müritleri, onun kaydedilmiş vaazını dinleyebilecek. Sözüm ona azizlerinin sağlığındaki fanatik tutumlarını, onun kalıntılarına karşı sergilemeye devam edebilecek. Hem otomatik şapelin inşası için yüklü bağışlar da gelir. Pek çok kimsenin bu görkemli hadisenin bir parçası olmak isteyeceğini sanıyorum."

"Bu hüküm, Sayın Kardinal'i korkutacaktır elbet... Fakat şunu da düşünmek gerek: Bundan yüzyıllar sonra bile Kardinal Anvylas'ın müritleri, onun kaydedilmiş vaazını dinleyebilecek. Sözüm ona azizlerinin sağlığındaki fanatik tutumlarını, onun kalıntılarına karşı sergilemeye devam edebilecek. Hem otomatik şapelin inşası için yüklü bağışlar da gelir. Pek çok kimsenin bu görkemli hadisenin bir parçası olmak isteyeceğini sanıyorum."
